channel.title: Weird spam links on some Wiki pages
channel.description:
Hey, I just wanted to let you guys know that there are a few dodgy links on the wiki. The (no longer existing) user DomTheo apparently added them last May and November (2014) to the following pages:
Category:Chapters - there are 5 spammy links inserted after the description [url]https://wiki.blackmesasource.com/Category:Chapters[/url]
Category:Weapons - there are 3 spammy links sprinkled around near the end of the description [url]https://wiki.blackmesasource.com/Category:Weapons[/url]
It seems people are having trouble registering new wiki accounts, so maybe someone with an existing account can get in there and weed that stuff out.

item.title: Weird spam links on some Wiki pages
item.dc:creator: CatzEyes93
item.description:
Block succeeded[/size]

Domtheo has been blocked.
See the block list to review blocks.

Read full topic
item.source: Weird spam links on some Wiki pages

item.title: Weird spam links on some Wiki pages
item.dc:creator: Flavrans
item.description:
The spammer has consistently re-added their spam every time it has been removed, and now it looks like they are starting to ramp up the spamming. A wiki admin really needs to block this spam user account soon before they do too much damage to the wiki.

Read full topic
item.source: Weird spam links on some Wiki pages

item.title: Weird spam links on some Wiki pages
item.dc:creator: TextFAMGUY1
item.description:
I have removed these. Thanks for the report, apologies for the extremely long delay. The wiki is rather dilapidated and outdated, at this point. We might need to do something about it, when we have time.

Read full topic

item.title: Weird spam links on some Wiki pages
item.dc:creator: cos
item.description:
Hey, I just wanted to let you guys know that there are a few dodgy links on the wiki.
The (no longer existing) user DomTheo apparently added them last May and November (2014) to the following pages:

Category:Chapters - there are 5 spammy links inserted after the description
https://wiki.blackmesasource.com/Category:Chapters

Category:Weapons - there are 3 spammy links sprinkled around near the end of the description
https://wiki.blackmesasource.com/Category:Weapons

It seems people are having trouble registering new wiki accounts, so maybe someone with an existing account can get in there and weed that stuff out.
